Automotive Mechanical Workshop – Repairs and Service

Jon Saunders Automotive is a professional family owned Adelaide mechanic business offering automotive repairs and servicing. We offer a unique set of services for both the public and in support of mechanics in the auto trade.

The automotive repair services we offer are:

  • Car service
  • Car repair
  • Car suspension repair
  • Brake repairs
  • Car steering repairs
  • Car engines repairs and reconditioning
  • Car gearbox repairs
  • Car transmissions repairs
  • Car differentials repairs
  • Auto electrician repairs for all car electrical systems and components

All of the above car repair services are available to all vehicle makes and models including Holden, Ford, Toyota, BMW, Mercedes, VW, Mazda, Nissan, and many more.

Diagnostic Scanning Equipment

Jon Saunders Automotive also uses the latest diagnostic scanning tools to identify problems with vehicle control systems – when a warning light shows on the dash, diagnostic tools are used to isolate the problem so that we can then quickly repair any damage or replace a faulty part.

Having problems with your car? Let us hook it up to our diagnostic equipment and find the problem for you – only $60

Engine Reconditioning Service

The team at Jon Sunders have had a great deal of experience in engine reconditioning, tuning and performance enhancement and can a provide diagnosis and advice on the best course of action with faulty or poor running engines. We are also skilled at parts refurbishment and machining.

4WD Specialists

One of our specialties is modifying 4X4 vehicles.

Our Range of four wheel drive services and enhancements includ:

  • suspension kits
  • exhaust upgrades
  • performance chips
  • fitting of ARB and TJM equipment including
  • snorkel
  • bull bars
  • rear tyre carriers and
  • various other parts

Competitive Car Services

Jon Saunders Automotive provide very competitive rates on car repairs for the following auto services:

Car safety inspections from $99
Car Services from $120
Car maintenance diagnostic scans to check for any problems from $60.00

After Hours Service

Jon Saunders Automotive understand the pressures of modern business and offer after hours service for customers such as trades people, who need their company vehicles during the week.
